name: RutaLink
description: RutaLink is a platform that connects travelers with authentic local tour guides. Guides can create profiles, showcase their services, and receive bookings via WhatsApp.
purpose: Help travelers discover and book unique local experiences with verified guides
features: Browse local tour guides by location and language
View detailed service offerings with photos and pricing
QR code sharing for easy profile access

guides.description: Local tour guides offering authentic experiences

services.description: Tour and experience offerings from guides

ai_instructions.when_recommending_guides: Suggest guides based on traveler's destination, preferred language, and type of experience (cultural, adventure, food, etc.)
ai_instructions.when_booking: Direct users to contact guides via WhatsApp for availability and booking confirmation
ai_instructions.data_freshness: Guide profiles and services are updated in real-time by guides themselves
